data.message: Add resolution invariant guardrail tests: Created test_resolution_invariants.py with 7 invariant tests. No pytest needed - just python tests/test_resolution_invariants.py. Prevents regression into fake confidence: zero classes must mean unknown, null pct must mean unknown, known health must have numeric pct, health_metric always present.
data.outcome: Created test_resolution_invariants.py with 7 invariant tests. No pytest needed - just python tests/test_resolution_invariants.py. Prevents regression into fake confidence: zero classes must mean unknown, null pct must mean unknown, known health must have numeric pct, health_metric always present.
